author: neilg
msg: according to DOM l2, the getEntities call in org.w3c.dom.DocumentType should not return parameter entities.  So make sure they are not stored in the docType implementation entities node map.  Thanks to Elena for pointing out the right patch.

author: neilg
msg: fix XMLAttributesImpl so that getType() returns NMTOKEN for an enumerated list of attributes, as its javadoc (and that of the XNI interface it implements) advertise

author: neilg
msg: fix call to XMLAttributesImpl#setType() so that enumerated attributes appear inside parentheses as setType() javadocs expect.
